feed.title: BCD-watch: New Baselines Report (weekly)
feed.subtitle: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

entry.title: BCD New Universal Implementations Report, Mon Jul 28 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new Baseline items in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 21 July 2025 through Monday, 28 July 2025üîó

15 new universal implementations

API

  1. api ‚ûû RTCStatsReport ‚ûû type_candidate-pair ‚ûû responsesReceived
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  2. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû URLPattern
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  3. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû ignoreCase_option
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  4. api ‚ûû URLPattern
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  5. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû exec
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  6. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû hasRegExpGroups
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  7. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû hash
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  8. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû hostname
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  9. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû password
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  10. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû pathname
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  11. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû port
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  12. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû protocol
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  13. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû search
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  14. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû test
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  15. api ‚ûû URLPattern ‚ûû username
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  • Previous report: Monday, 21 July 2025

entry.title: BCD New Universal Implementations Report, Mon Jul 07 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new Baseline items in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 30 June 2025 through Monday, 7 July 2025üîó

6 new universal implementations

API

  1. api ‚ûû HTMLElement ‚ûû beforetoggle_event ‚ûû dialog_elements
    Added to Safari  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  2. api ‚ûû HTMLElement ‚ûû toggle_event ‚ûû dialog_elements
    Added to Safari  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  3. api ‚ûû HTMLElement ‚ûû showPopover ‚ûû options_source_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  4. api ‚ûû HTMLElement ‚ûû togglePopover ‚ûû force_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  5. api ‚ûû HTMLElement ‚ûû togglePopover ‚ûû options_force_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  6. api ‚ûû HTMLElement ‚ûû togglePopover ‚ûû options_source_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ‚ûû  3 of 3 engines
  • Previous report: Monday, 30 June 2025

entry.title: BCD New Universal Implementations Report, Mon Jun 30 2025
entry.summary: Weekly summary of new Baseline items in BCD data
entry.content:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 23 June 2025 through Monday, 30 June 2025üîó
